oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Information Concerning Christian Brothers College High School Department, Conducted by the Christian Brothers, 1940-1941
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Schools; De La Salle Christian Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Prospectus detailed the required coursework for the various courses of study at CBC's High School tuition when it moved to the East Parkway location in 1940. (It was $125 a year.)

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
